title: Analjit Singh’s family office clears Rs 5,500-6,000 cr KKR debt by selling 3.2% stake in Max Financial
description: Analjit Singh's family office has repaid debts worth ₹5,500-6,000 crore taken from KKR & Co a decade ago for investments in property and hospitality ventures. The final tranche of ₹1,200 crore was cleared last week using funds from a 3.2% stake sale in Max Financial, reducing the family's holding to 3.2%.
